content:
Went for a 12 hour walk yesterday. Thought it would be easy. Went up pigeon mountain, Mount Wellington, Mount Hobson, Mount St John, Mount Eden. Then to the sky tower. Then to museum. Then I literally hobbled down to Ellerslie. The longer it went the more hell I experienced. But not in the way you learn something about yourself. I just fucken sucked. I did journal a few things. But it wasn't worth the pain. 
In hindsight I think the mistake was no sunblocking my legs. It's the next day and the only pain is from sunburn... 

New topic, Tires with Shane Gillis is fucken gold. The office but better
